title: LF Plat-Diamond ADC for serious 5s (Starting tonight)
body:
Looking for an ADC for 5s. Our MMR is something like 21-2200. Everyone is either plat or diamond. Have a coach. We have good synergy and looking for a 5th to do some test games tonight. 
Requirements: Be currently mid-high plat/diamond **THIS SEASON ONLY**. Last season doesn't mean ####. (sorry boosters lololololol)
Games will start @10:45 eastern(ish)


Requirements:
- Skype
- Large champion pool
- No rage
- Can play frequently, especially nights. 



Post down here then add me in game. I'll be checking peeps when I get home.

replies.body: Also interested if the spot is open

IGN: SyKo Sanity
Rank: Platinum 2
LolSkill Link: http://www.lolskill.net/summoner/NA/Syko%20Sanity
